parameters: TEマップイベント呼び出し ●イベント 1
\n<Grandpa Wizard>We've got new products in stock, ya know.
\n<Grandpa Wizard>We've got new products in stock, ya know.
TEマップイベント呼び出し ●メインエンジン 2
TEマップイベント呼び出し ●メインエンジン 3
TEマップイベント呼び出し ●世間話 1
TEマップイベント呼び出し ●世間話 \v[10]

When I look around, colorful potions are bubbling
and giving off a mysterious fragrance.

\n<Grandpa Wizard>Well, take your time. Your lifespan as a Gold
Dragon is long.

\n<Grandpa Wizard>Items should be used sparingly in everyday
situations, but don't hesitate to use them when
necessary.

\n<Grandpa Wizard>You shouldn't skimp on potions, or you'll regret
it if everyone gets wiped out.

\n<Grandpa Wizard>I recommend the Guardian Coin. It can raise your
defense for one turn.

\n<Grandpa Wizard>If you time it right against the enemy's powerful
attack, the damage will decrease significantly.
It's a great deal!

\n<Grandpa Wizard>In this world, there are various artifacts.
Depending on how they are used, they can be
incredibly useful, but if used incorrectly, they
can also lead to self-destruction...

\n<Grandpa Wizard>If you obtain it, it's important to carefully
consider how to use it effectively.

\n<Grandpa Wizard>To use the artifact, you need to charge it. The
more powerful the artifact, the more charge it
requires.

\n<Grandpa Wizard>If there's an adventurer skilled in handling
artifacts, they could help speed up the charging.
It might be worth looking for one.
